author: wobinb
title: the set that got my started - i think
review:
This set is really just a typical BASIC starter set. It is however significant to me, as it was probably my first set. I must have been four or five at the time.

It included everything you would need, some doors and windows, some wheels, and even the part to make the windmill sails.

The only complaint I would make, is that the cars were a bit simple, the mini-figs couldn't sit inside them.
